item.title: By: Rob McDonagh
item.dc:creator: Rob McDonagh
item.description: <p>Yeah, I hope the Gold release has dramatic improvement in the Composite App dev tools. As it is, they're pretty lame. And debugging them? Good luck with that. Maybe if it really was as simple as "wiring" things together, our issues would be moot. But in my experience, as with yours, even the examples they published don't work reliably. And FSM help you if you try to build one from scratch... </p>
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I hope the Gold release has dramatic improvement in the Composite App dev tools. As it is, they’re pretty lame. And debugging them? Good luck with that. Maybe if it really was as simple as “wiring” things together, our issues would be moot. But in my experience, as with yours, even the examples they published don’t work reliably. And FSM help you if you try to build one from scratch…

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Good to hear I'm not alone. I was deliberately trying not to slag off the beta as I am quite aware that it's not complete. We'll see later this month I guess.</p>
item.content:encoded: Good to hear I’m not alone. I was deliberately trying not to slag off the beta as I am quite aware that it’s not complete. We’ll see later this month I guess.

item.title: By: Charles Robinson
item.dc:creator: Charles Robinson
item.description: <p>Your experience isn't so different from mine, and I'm running a fairly recent install of Windows XP SP2. I'm going to wait until the gold release before I complain about it too much. I've been kneecapped one time too many for daring to comment on the state of Notes 8 beta. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Your experience isn’t so different from mine, and I’m running a fairly recent install of Windows XP SP2. I’m going to wait until the gold release before I complain about it too much. I’ve been kneecapped one time too many for daring to comment on the state of Notes 8 beta. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif“ />
